subject: Economy
question_en: What is the gross domestic product (GDP) of India in 2019-2020?
question_hi: 2019-2020 में भारत का ग्रॉस भारत के ग्रॉस क्षेत्रों का GDP क्या था?
explanation_en: The correct answer is D. According to the official figures released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the GDP of India in 2020-21 was Rs. 22.64 trillion.
